About Me

My name is Sebastien Coll and I am a 2024 Computer Engineering graduate (University of Ottawa). I have experience full stack web development, mobile development, embedded systems, test automation and tooling. I have worked at a number of companies gaining teamwork and leadership skills.
Fully bilingual in French and English.

Projects

Sippe

React Native, Firebase Suite, GCP, Stripe

Mobile application for streamlined food and drinks ordering, specialized in events. I learned a lot about how to make a mobile app from scratch and how to deal with real time changes to make it a seemless experience for the user.

Agriculture robot

Arduino, Raspberry Pi, C, Python, React Native, Firebase Suite

Mobile-controlled/autonomous robot with multiple sensors and motors used to gather information of a garden or agricultural lands. Great learning experience for robotics, embedded systems, and mobile app development.

Gamekeeper WebApp

React

Web application used by scorekeepers in the Ottawa/Gatineau Region to mark hockey games in real time. Built in pure React, this project was a great way to learn how to make a web app from scratch. I learned a lot about user experience and how to make an application simple to use. It is still in use today.

Garden web store

React, MongoDB, Express, Node.js (MERN)

Simple web store for nurseries to sell their products. First project I made using the MERN stack. I learned a lot about how to make a full stack web app. I also learned a lot about how to make a good looking website and how to make it user friendly.
